Resume


EXPERIENCE

Sunnyvale, CA
Software Engineer Intern, Search

Bangalore, India / Redwood City, CA
Technical Director - Layout / Stereoscopic 3D

  • Lead the design and development of a Camera – I/O system that enables artists to iterate 2x faster with stereo camera animation. This technology is now being used by multiple feature film productions across the studio
  • Developed new features and enhanced existing features in the studio’s core graphics, stereo and web toolset by gathering user stories

Vancouver, BC
Research Intern - Multimedia Information Management & Security

GRADUATE TEACHING & PROJECTS

Georgia Institute of Technology
Atlanta, GA
Graduate Teaching Assistant - Computational Photography
Jan. 2015 - May 2015
  • Helped the course instructor in designing and grading assignments for a class of nearly 150 students
  • Assisted students over an online platform with questions and concerns on the course material
Smart Scheduler: Collaborative Event Scheduling on iOS and Android
Jan. 2015 - May 2015
  • Part of a team that developed an event scheduling application (on iOS and Android) that queries the device's native calendar to find common available time slots for all participants
CaMor: 3D Animation Generator for Rectangular Images
Aug. 2014 - May. 2015
  • Developed a system for generating natural 3D morphs from perspective projections of rectangular images
  • The underlying novel algorithm computes a closed-form solution for recovering the orientation of the original 3D plane from the projection
The Pictionary Problem: Recognition of Hand-drawn Images
Aug. 2014 - Dec. 2014
  • Part of a team that developed an algorithm for identifying hand-drawn sketches of various objects. The challenge was in accounting for the vast variation in drawing and sketching styles of different people
Syllable Extraction from Zebra Finch Songs
Aug. 2014 - Dec. 2014
  • Designed and implemented a technique for building a language model from birdsongs to identify the underlying grammar by applying pattern recognition techniques on birdsong recordings
  • Implemented methods for feature extraction (pipeline for extracting MFCCs), clustering the features (k-means), detecting sequence patterns and transition probabilities (HMMs) and finally evaluating cluster quality (Silhouette index scores) and sequence quality (Levenshtein distance and TF-IDF)
